ygData.subject: Re: banded gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: This truely is a pain but there are no banded gloves to be made.  I ve sold several people full suits of banded and then here You forgot the gloves. Then I
ygData.messageBody:
This truely is a pain but there are no banded gloves to be made. I've sold
several people full suits of banded and then here "You forgot the gloves."
Then I have to explain to them that there are no banded gloves. It really
is a pain. I don't know if they forgot or did it on purpose but it would
have been nice to make them. The best you can do is get ringmail or chain
to go along with the banded. I

Mark

Amazing $14,000 Opportunity. Click below for details.
http://www.24689.com

> From: tiggy <tiggy@...>
>
> Greetings all....
> One quick question. I have been doing smithing for what seems like
> forever and am way above master level. However, in all my time of smithing
> I have yet to see or find a mold for banded gloves though I've had many
> MANY customers request them. Does anyone know if banded gloves even exist
> and if so are there molds to make them or must they be bought from
> merchant...and if there are molds to make them...where the heck are they
> hiding them?? lol Thanks much for any help. ;)
>
> Twilite
